title: The Devil's Hand (Horror, 1961) Linda Christian, Robert Alda | Full Movie

sources.title: The Devil's Hand (Horror, 1961) Linda Christian, Robert Alda | Full Movie
sources.description:
Still alive...the ancient cult of voodoo!
Haunted by recurring dreams of a mesmerizing woman dancing in the sky,  Rick's mysterious visions take a startling turn when he discovers a doll that uncannily resembles his fiancee. As he becomes increasingly entangled in a web of seduction and manipulation, he is lured into a sinister sect that worships the diabolic Camba.

Also available colorized: https://youtu.be/yRCQoHwbNWY


Original title: The Devil's Hand (1961) AKA: Devil's Doll / Witchcraft

This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: William J. Hole Jr.
Writer: Jo Heims 
Stars: Linda Christian, Robert Alda, Ariadne Welter 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Horror


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:27 A man encounters a mysterious doll resembling a woman from his dreams, leading to confusion and intrigue.
10:05 Mysterious events unfold around a doll shop owner and a woman, leading to a dangerous quest for answers.
16:46 A woman with supernatural powers lures a man into a cult that worships a devil god and involves human sacrifice.
27:48 A cult worships a devil god, offering sacrifices for judgment and loyalty tests among members.
39:27 A woman faces loyalty dilemmas in a mysterious cult, leading to unexpected events and a sudden change in health.
51:21 A mysterious betrayal leads to a deadly confrontation and a plea for separation.
1:05:00 A group worships a devil god and sacrifices a young girl to test loyalty, leading to a twist.
